title: Trump admin orders fed agencies to scrub worker COVID vaccine records
shortDescription: 'Things got out of hand during the pandemic, and federal workers were fired, punished, or sidelined' for declining vaccines, OPM chief says.

title: 'You're not going on vacation.' Texas Democrats cope with exodus
shortDescription: Texas Democrats packed their bags and made plans to be out of the state for weeks. Some are missing big events, like their kid's first day of school.

title: The idea of a Nobel Peace Prize for Trump is gaining steam. Why?
shortDescription: At least five world leaders are supporting Trump for the Nobel Peace Prize.

title: Texas AG Ken Paxton sues 13 Dems for abandoning House duties
shortDescription: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton is suing 13 Democrats, claiming their walkout to block GOP maps represents an abandonment of their offices.

title: Trump: Russia-Ukraine talks could see land swaps
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said a Russia-Ukraine peace deal could involve swapping territories that could benefit both nations.

title: Trump-Putin summit set for Alaska to discuss Ukraine war
shortDescription: The Aug. 15 summit will mark the first time the U.S. and Russia leaders will be together in person during President Trump's second term.

title: Trump teases imminent summit with Russia's Putin, location TBD
shortDescription: A peace deal to end Russia's invasion of Ukraine could include an exchange of territories, President Donald Trump said.

title: Trump to remove IRS chief two months after he was confirmed
shortDescription: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent will serve as acting interim IRS commissioner until a replacement is found.

title: Trump eyes US military action against drug cartels
shortDescription: "We have to start treating them as armed terrorist organizations, not simply drug dealing organizations," Secretary of State Marco Rubio said.

title: Beto O'Rourke backs Democrats fleeing Texas over GOP congressional map
shortDescription: Beto O'Rourke is going to bat for Texas Democrats - on the road and online - as they attempt to stop GOP plans to redraw Texas' congressional maps.

title: Trump Mobile's T1 Phone release pushed back to October from August
shortDescription: Trump Mobile, a new enterprise from the Trump Organization, has pushed back its T1 Phone release date from August to October. Here is what we know.

title: JD Vance brushes off 2028 election talk
shortDescription: JD Vance says he's not focused on the 2028 election during his recent United Kingdom visit, despite Trump calling him a likely MAGA successor.

title: La administración Trump aumenta la recompensa para capturar a Nicolás Maduro: lo que debes saber
shortDescription: El gobierno de Trump duplica la recompensa a 50 millones de dólares por el arresto de Nicolás Maduro, vinculado al narcotráfico y a la conspiración con cocaína.

title: Trump international peace deal includes the 'Trump Route'
shortDescription: Key to a new peace deal between Armenia and Azerbaijan is a "Trump Route for International Peace and Prosperity" that will open access in the region.

title: Trump deploys law enforcement to DC
shortDescription: President Donald Trump deployed federal agents to D.C., calling for prosecuting minors as adults amid his administration's crime concerns.

title: Trump officials dodge contempt ruling over deportation flights
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge James Boasberg's order "raises troubling questions" over foreign policy and criminal justice, Circuit Judge Gregory Katsas wrote.

title: Trump orders feds to patrol streets of Washington, D.C.
shortDescription: President Trump ordered an increased federal law enforcement presence in Washington, D.C. after a former DOGE staffer was assaulted.

title: American Nazis: The Aryan Freedom Network is riding high in Trump era
shortDescription: Trump “awakened a lot of people to the issues we’ve been raising for years,” Dalton Henry Stout told Reuters. “He’s the best thing that’s happened to us.”

title: Is your community an immigrant sanctuary? Trump issues new target list
shortDescription: Federal judges have halted previous efforts to crack down on communities the Trump administration says is impeding immigration enforcement.

title: Nuclear power roars back, thanks to Trump administration
shortDescription: Although it has long triggered fears of meltdowns and radioactive waste, nuclear power is considered an 'extremely safe,' zero-emission power source.

title: Is Trump making school 6 months long? No, those TikTok videos are fake
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has not suggested making the school year 6 months long, as those TikTok videos suggest. Here is what he has done.

title: FBI removes Trump case investigators
shortDescription: According to reports, the FBI removed leaders tied to Trump and Jan. 6 probes, sparking concern from the FBI Agents Association.
